CustomField.formula:
IF( Implementation_Role__c ="RM",
IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Call_Checklist_Completed__c, "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Call_Checklist_Completed__c, "N/A")),0.20,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Plan_Provisions__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Plan_Provisions__c , "N/A")),0.20,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Implementation_Call_Notes__c, "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Implementation_Call_Notes__c, "N/A")),0.20,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Scheduling_Next_Stage_Calls__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Scheduling_Next_Stage_Calls__c , "N/A")),0.20,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Outstanding_Items__c, "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Outstanding_Items__c, "N/A")),0.20,0) ,
IF(Completed_Within_SLA__c,0.33,0)+ IF(Implementation_Notes_Added__c,0.33,0)+ IF(SOP_Followed__c,0.34,0) )
CustomField.label: Imp QA Score
